attributes.action: TFL should take over Southern Railways if it fails to improve its service
attributes.additional_details:
Sourthern Railways service to London Bridge and London Victoria during peak times is extremely poor. The train is hardly on time and it is a great stress on commuters. During my last 50 journeys alone, southern railways failed to arrive on time 80% of the time. In my last 17 journeys, it failed to arrive on time on all 17 times.

It is our request that the 'Department of Transport' does something about it as the southern railways don't even take our complaints seriously.

It is our request to force 'southern railways' to improve its service or bring it under the umbrella of TFL.
